cscie97.asn4.housemate.entitlement

Class AccessToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscie97.asn4.housemate.entitlement.AccessToken

  • public class AccessToken
extends java.lang.Object
    AccessTokens are used for authorization purposes. Each User account will have an AccessToken created for them when they login to the site. Any future calls to restricted interface methods on either the cscie97.asn4.housemate.model.IHouseMateModelServieAPI or cscie97.asn4.housemate.controller.IHouseMateConrollerServiceAPI must pass the id of the user's AccessToken in order to proceed. AccessTokens have a 1 hour default timeout, but successive calls to restricted interface methods on any of the supported APIs will increment this expiration time.
    See Also:
    User
